translation.source: The probability of an event is a number between 0 and 1, inclusive.
translation.target: Ìṣeéṣe ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan jẹ́ nọ́mbà láàrín 0 àti 1, tímọ́.

translation.source: The sum of the interior angles of a polygon with n sides is (n - 2) × 180 degrees.
translation.target: Àpapọ̀ àwọn igun inú oníhàpúpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹgbẹ́ n jẹ́ (n - 2) × 180 àléfà.

translation.source: A boundary value problem is a differential equation together with a set of boundary conditions.
translation.target: Ìyọnu iye-ààlà jẹ́ ọ̀mì-ìyàtọ̀sọ́tọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìtò àwọn ipò ààlà.

translation.source: A zero-sum game is a game where one player's gain is exactly balanced by another player's loss.
translation.target: Ere òdo-àpapọ̀ jẹ́ ere níbi tí èrè ẹlẹ́rẹ kan jẹ́ fífẹ̀gbálẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ikọlulẹ ẹlẹ́rẹ mìíràn.

translation.source: The degree of a polynomial is the highest power of the variable.
translation.target: Ìpele òṣùwọ̀npúpọ̀ jẹ́ agbára ga jùlọ onídìmọ̀ náà.

translation.source: Statistics is the science of collecting, analyzing, interpreting, and presenting data.
translation.target: Ẹ̀kọ́ ìwọ̀ndátà jẹ́ ìmọ̀-jinlẹ̀ nípa kíkójọ, títúpalẹ̀, títúmọ̀, àti fífihan dátà.

translation.source: A square has four equal sides and four right angles.
translation.target: Àkòdì ní ẹgbẹ́ mẹ́rin dọ́gba àti igun-ọ̀tún mẹ́rin.

translation.source: A constraint is a condition that a solution to an optimization problem must satisfy.
translation.target: Ìdílọ́wọ́ jẹ́ ipò tí ojútùú sí ìyọnu ìdára gbọ́dọ̀ mú ṣẹ.

translation.source: The perimeter of a shape is the total distance around it.
translation.target: Àyíká eéyà jẹ́ àpapọ̀ ìjìnnà yíká rẹ̀.

translation.source: Multiplication is a mathematical operation that involves repeated addition.
translation.target: Ìsọdipúpọ̀ jẹ́ ìṣirò tó jẹ mọ́ àròpọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan.

translation.source: The volume of a cube is the cube of the length of its side.
translation.target: Àyè ìgọ̀n jẹ́ onírìnmẹ́ta gígùn ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀.

translation.source: A tree is a connected graph with no cycles.
translation.target: Igi jẹ́ àwòrán asọpọ̀ pẹ̀lú kò sí àwọn àyídà.

translation.source: The diagonal of a square divides it into two equal triangles.
translation.target: Eyitẹlẹ àkòdì pín in sí anígunmẹ́ta méjì dọ́gba.

translation.source: One is the first counting number.
translation.target: Ọ̀kan ni òòkà àkọ́kọ́ tí a fi nbẹ̀rẹ̀ kíkà.

translation.source: The total surface area of a sphere is 4πr², where r is the radius.
translation.target: Àtọ̀wọ́dà òrò òṣùṣù jẹ́ 4πr², níbi tí r jẹ́ igbó.

translation.source: The mean of a set of numbers is their sum divided by their count.
translation.target: Àròpín ìtò òòkà kan jẹ́ àròpọ̀ wọn pín pẹ̀lú iye wọn.

translation.source: A sphere is a three-dimensional shape where all points are equidistant from the center.
translation.target: Òṣùṣù jẹ́ èèyà olópomẹ́ta níbi tí gbogbo ojú jẹ́ ìjìnnà kannáà láti àárín.

translation.source: The solution to a system of linear equations is the set of values that satisfies all equations in the system.
translation.target: Ojútùú sí ètò àwọn ọ̀mì-dogbá jẹ́ ìtò àwọn iye tí ó mú gbogbo àwọn ọ̀mì nínú ètò náà ṣẹ.

translation.source: A circle is a round plane figure with every point on its boundary equidistant from its center.
translation.target: Ẹ̀ká jẹ́ àwòrán pẹpẹ tí gbogbo ojú lára ìgbàtí rẹ̀ jẹ́ òjìí kan láti àárín rẹ̀.

translation.source: Vectors have both magnitude and direction.
translation.target: Àwọn ògún ní iwọ̀n àti ìhà méjèèjì.

translation.source: A circle is a conic section formed when a plane intersects a cone perpendicular to the axis of the cone.
translation.target: Ẹ̀ká jẹ́ abala kọ́nìkì tí a ṣẹ̀dá nígbà tí pẹpẹ bá da kọ́nù lọ́nà ọgbà sí ọ̀pọ̀n kọ́nù náà.

translation.source: An obtuse angle is greater than 90 degrees but less than 180 degrees.
translation.target: Igun fífẹ̀ tóbi ju àádọ́rùn-ún àléfà lọ ṣùgbọ́n kò tó ọgọ́ọ̀rùn-ún ó lé ọgọ́tin àléfà.

translation.source: The solutions to a quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0 are x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / 2a.
translation.target: Àwọn ojútùú ọ̀mì-onírìnméjì ax² + bx + c = 0 jẹ́ x = (-b ± √(b² - 4ac)) / 2a.

translation.source: The number e is an irrational number approximately equal to 2.71828.
translation.target: Òòkà e jẹ́ òòkà àìdéédé tí ó tó fẹ́rẹ̀ 2.71828.

translation.source: A circle is a shape where all points are equidistant from the center.
translation.target: Ẹ̀ká jẹ́ àwòṣe níbi tí gbogbo àwọn ojúami jẹ́ ìjìnnà kan náà láti ibi àárín.

translation.source: Perpendicular lines meet at right angles.
translation.target: Àwọn ilà ògìdo pàdé ní igun-ọ̀tún.

translation.source: The derivative of a function gives its rate of change.
translation.target: Déríféétífù ìfà fún oṣùwọ̀n ìyípadà rẹ̀.

translation.source: The integral of a function gives the area under its curve.
translation.target: Ìtẹ́gùn ìfà fún òrò lábẹ́ kọ́ńfù rẹ̀.

translation.source: A parallelogram is a quadrilateral with opposite sides parallel and equal.
translation.target: Oníhàmẹ́rin apọgbà jẹ́ onímẹ́rin tí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ kejikejì jẹ́ ọgbà tí wọ́n sì dọ́gba.

translation.source: Linear programming is a method to achieve the best outcome in a mathematical model with linear constraints.
translation.target: Ìṣírò-dogbá jẹ́ ọ̀nà láti ṣe àṣeyọrí èsì tí ó dára jùlọ nínú àwòṣe ìṣirò pẹ̀lú àwọn ìdílọ́wọ́ dogbá.

translation.source: A semicircle is half of a circle.
translation.target: Ààbọ̀-ẹ̀ká jẹ́ ìdajì ẹ̀ká.
